verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bind us together Lord, bind us together, With cords that cannot be broken. Bind us together Lord, bind us together, Bind us together with love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is only one God. There is only one King. There is only one body. That is why I sing.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bind us together Lord, bind us together, With cords that cannot be broken. Bind us together Lord, bind us together, Bind us together with love.{/lang-eng}
